metadata.name: Breakfast
metadata.description:
- Illustration of the poem "Breakfast" 
by Jacques Perevar

He poured the coffee into the cup.
He poured milk into the coffee.
He poured the sugar into the coffee milk.
He combined it with a teaspoon.
He drank the milk and put his cup down.
Without telling me anything
 He lit a cigarette.
He blew out a ring of smoke.
He put his ashes in the ashtray.
without looking at me
He put his hat on his head.
He put on his raincoat because it was raining
and left the house in the rain.
Without a single word
without a glance
I held my head in my hands and
My tears flowed.

Technique: Collage
2480 * 3508 PIX
